title: “Even the squirrel did well”
author: VD
content_html:
Thus spake Arsene Wenger after the Gunners beat Villareal 1-0. “He was fast,” the Arsenal manager added. Personally, I thought his defense was limited, but he did a nice job of shutting down Diego Forlani given his size disadvantage.

This will hardly surprise Manchester United fans, of course.
